text:
Hey team, looking to work with Cameron Parker for Big W. 
            Budget is approx $20,183 - need 1 x Instagram story, 2 x Media interview, 1 x Facebook story, 3 x 2-minute tutorial, 3 x 60-second YouTube video. 4 weeks exclusivity, 6 month engagement. Usage: 10 months. Start date: January 2026.
